metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20847 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An improper computation of p_tx0, p_tx1, p_ty0 and p_ty1 in the functionopj_get_encoding_parameters in openjp2/pi.c in OpenJPEG through 2.3.0 canlead to an integer overflow.

criterions.comment: insighttoolkit4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
